name: Eric Burdon
description:
'''Eric Victor Burdon''' (born 11 May 1941) is an English singer and songwriter. He was previously the lead vocalist of the original lineup of the [[British rhythm and blues|R&B]] and [[Rock music|rock]] band [[the Animals]] and the [[funk]] band [[War (band)|War]]. He is currently the lead vocalist of the present day lineup of Eric Burdon & the Animals. Burdon is regarded as one of the [[British Invasion]]'s most distinctive singers with his deep, powerful [[blues-rock]] voice and is known for his intense stage performances.

In 2008, he was ranked 57th in ''[[Rolling Stone]]''<nowiki>'</nowiki>s list of "The 100 Greatest Singers of All Time".
